arStrings.szText: {c_gold}Use: {/c}Increases Fire, Cold, and Shadow Resistances by {c_yellow}+15%{/c} and their Maximum Resistances by {c_yellow}+2%{/c} for every nearby player and increases Experience by {c_yellow}5%{/c}. Lasts 20 minutes.
This is a type I incense. Only one Incense of a type may be active at a time. Experience Bonus does not stack with other Incenses.
